description: This Java class, StorageConfig, is a Spring configuration component that defines a bean for a StorageProvider. It configures the storage provider based on environment variables, supporting local storage, Amazon S3, and Azure Blob storage, selected at runtime via application properties.

classes.name: StorageConfig
classes.description: Spring configuration class that provides a StorageProvider bean based on environment properties.

methods.name: storageProvider
methods.description: Creates and returns a StorageProvider instance based on the 'app.storage.provider' property, supporting 'local', 's3', and 'azure' options.
